attributes.action: Stop the take over of our air sea recue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this take over of our air,sea,rescue should not be sold off to anyone and should remian in british hands. no-one is as good as our people for doing this job////this will be fatal to our country
